00073              /**
00074               * try to do an educated guess about the users real ip, even if he is behind proxies
00075               */
00076              public function getIp() {
00077                           foreach ($this->simpleHeaders as $header) {
00078                                        $h = env($header);
00079                                        if (isset ($h) && !empty ($h)) {
00080                                                     return $h;
00081                                        }
00082                           }
00083                           return '0.0.0.0';
00084              }
00085 
00086              public function isUsingProxy() {
00087                           foreach ($this->proxyHeaders as $header) {
00088                                        $h = env($header);
00089                                        if (isset($h) && !empty($h)) {
00090                                                     return true;
00091                                                     break;
00092                                        }
00093                           }
00094                           return false;
00095              }
00096 
00097 }
